short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid the dreaded clock time by using the sun and moon!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension overrides your new tab page to display the current position of the sun and the moon. Optionally, it will also show you the time. This extension requires your current geolocation position to calculate the relative position of the sun and moon.
